ygData.subject: Taper enchantment?
ygData.msgSnippet: So how does this spell work?  I know the air crackles around me when I cast it, but does it actually lessen the time a nasty spell sticks to you? All I know is
ygData.messageBody:
So how does this spell work? I know the air crackles around me when I cast
it, but does it actually
lessen the time a nasty spell sticks to you?

All I know is that I use this spell to raise the spell skill associated to
it because it costs hardly any mana.

Azboklin the enchanter
